amendment.description: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to provide $2 million funds for the National Endowment for Children's Educational Television. The amendment would reduce by a commensurate amount funding for the Bureau of the Census to carry out periodic censuses.

action.text: Mr. Rogers raised a point of order against the Engel amendment (A021). Mr. Rogers stated that the provisions of the amendment represents the unauthorized appropriation of funds and was, therefore, in violation of the rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.
